verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> when we could <S%G4722><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> forbear <S%G4722><s%>, we thought it good <S%G2106><s%> to be left <S%G2641><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Athens <S%G116><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> Timotheus <S%G5095><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellowlabourer <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to comfort <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>:

That no man <S%G3367><s%> should be moved <S%G4525><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are appointed <S%G2749><s%> thereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G2532><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> we were <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, we told <S%G4302><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> before <S%G4302><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we should <S%G3195><s%> suffer tribulation <S%G2346><s%>; even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%>.

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%>, when I <S%G2504><s%> could <S%G4722><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> forbear <S%G4722><s%>, I sent <S%G3992><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, lest by some means <S%G3381><s%> <S%G4458><s%> the tempter <S%G3985><s%> have tempted <S%G3985><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> labour <S%G2873><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> vain <S%G2756><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G737><s%> when Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G2097><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> good tidings <S%G2097><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> charity <S%G26><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> good <S%G18><s%> remembrance <S%G3417><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> always <S%G3842><s%>, desiring greatly <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, as <S%G2509><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to see you <S%G5209><s%>:

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, we were comforted <S%G3870><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> distress <S%G318><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>:
For <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> stand fast <S%G4739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thanks <S%G2169><s%> can we <S%G1410><s%> render <S%G467><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> again <S%G467><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, for <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> we joy <S%G5463><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes <S%G5209><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

Night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> praying <S%G1189><s%> exceedingly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G5228><s%> that <S%G1519><s%> we might see <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> might perfect <S%G2675><s%> that which is lacking <S%G5303><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>?

Now <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, direct <S%G2720><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> make <S%G4121><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to increase <S%G4121><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> in love <S%G26><s%> one <S%G240><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> another <S%G240><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> do toward <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>:

To the end <S%G1519><s%> he may stablish <S%G4741><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> unblameable <S%G273><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> holiness <S%G42><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>.
